author: smilek
msg: added request.setAttribute JetspeedDesktop.DESKTOP_ENABLED_REQUEST_ATTRIBUTE - this allows portlet pipeline requests to see that desktop is enabled

author: smilek
msg: FlashPortlet which uses SWFObject library (http://code.google.com/p/swfobject) to dynamically load flash content - replaces previous FlashPortlet in applications/demo

added to support loading flash content dynamically - this solves the IE click to load active content probem (Microsoft/Eolas patent issue), and also nicely handles cases where client flash player upgrade is needed
reads swf file header to obtain player version requirements and height/width of flash content
supports init-params object element param children and object element attributes - values for these init-params use semicolon to separate each pair and equals to separate name and value:
gems jar contains default ViewPage and EditPage templates - if ViewPage/EditPage are not specified in portlet.xml, the jar based versions will be used
preferences are used for src, height and width:

author: smilek
msg: SWFObject v2.0 beta5 http://code.google.com/p/swfobject/ - added to support loading flash content dynamically - this solves the IE click to load active content probem (Microsoft/Eolas patent issue), and also nicely handles cases where client flash player upgrade is needed - the new gems FlashPortlet uses this library to load the flash content - this file is used only by /portal because /desktop has the a reduced/modified version of this library contained in desktop/core.js

author: wrowe
msg: It's a makefile, tabs are ok, use them.
